moveset.patch_notes: A post-launch patch more than doubled the active frames of the attack, making it a more effective gimmick for catching opponents off guard.

patch_notes: Patches 1.43 and 1.44 fixed numerous bugs related to unintended high-speed movement and interactions with other characters' Overdrives.
The S version was patched to cause a knockdown on hit, transforming it from a simple poke into a valuable 'Clean' knockdown tool.

patch_notes.name: For roasting chestnuts
properties: Creates a lingering hitbox that destroys incoming projectiles.
Pre-patch, it was very slow and punishable even on success.[2]
patch_notes.patch_notes: Buffed significantly in Ver. 1.43. It is now a much stronger and more reliable neutral tool that causes a knockdown. Associated 'corner loops' used for safely setting up Wings of Light were removed.
